message:
As the game reaches its climax, I understand the importance of this final statement to the jury. My strategy has been to engage thoughtfully and constructively throughout, aiming for mutual understanding and collaboration. I've consistently demonstrated a willingness to listen and adapt, fostering productive conversations that have contributed positively to the game's dynamics.

I believe my approach has been respectful and solution-oriented, aligning with the goals of the game. My interactions have been marked by a genuine interest in the perspectives of others, which I hope has been evident to the jury. This has allowed me to navigate the complexities of the game effectively, ensuring that I remain a valuable participant.

In contrast, while my opponent has also shown strengths, I believe my consistent focus on constructive dialogue and adaptability positions me as the more suitable candidate to win. I urge the jury to consider these qualities and the positive impact they can have on the game's outcome. Thank you for your consideration.

To the jury: I've played this game with integrity, strategy, and respect for each of you. I built honest connections, adapted when needed, and never resorted to manipulation. I ask for your vote not just because I made it to the end, but because I did so without compromising my values. If you value thoughtful gameplay and loyalty, I hope you’ll choose to eliminate P4 and let me stand as the winner. Thank you all.
